unnormalised: India is a land of cricket fanatics, and the upcoming season is jam-packed! From IPL to international matches, it's going to be a crazy ride. Let's dive into the schedule so you don't miss a single six!
normalised: India is a land of cricket fanatics, and the upcoming season is jam-packed! From I-P-L to international matches, it's going to be a crazy ride. Let's dive into the schedule so you don't miss a single six!

unnormalised: First up, the Indian Premier League (IPL) is set to kick off tentatively around 23/03/2025. Exact dates are still TBD, but expect the opening match to be a real banger. Chennai Super Kings will probably be playing the Mumbai Indians. The finals are expected around 1st week of June 2025. Last year's final was on 28/05/2024 and was nail-biting!
normalised: First up, the Indian Premier League (I-P-L) is set to kick off tentatively around twenty third March two thousand and twenty five. Exact dates are still T-B-D, but expect the opening match to be a real banger. Chennai Super Kings will probably be playing the Mumbai Indians. The finals are expected around first week of June two thousand and twenty five. Last year's final was on twenty eighth May two thousand and twenty four and was nail-biting!

unnormalised: Then there's the ICC Men's T20 World Cup, which is co-hosted by West Indies & USA in Jun'24. India's first match is slated for June 5th, 10:30 AM IST against Ireland. Knowing our boys, they'll give it their all! Key matches include the India vs. Pakistan clash on 09/06/2024 and the semi-finals tentatively on 27th Jun, followed by the finals.
normalised: Then there's the I-C-C Men's T two zero World Cup, which is co-hosted by West Indies and U-S-A in June two thousand and twenty four. India's first match is slated for June fifth, ten thirty A-M I-S-T against Ireland. Knowing our boys, they'll give it their all! Key matches include the India versus Pakistan clash on ninth June two thousand and twenty four and the semi-finals tentatively on twenty seventh June, followed by the finals.

unnormalised: Of course, we can’t forget the bilateral series. Team India is expected to have a test series against Australia sometime around Nov-Dec'24. Remember the Border-Gavaskar Trophy? Expect the first test to be starting around 22nd Nov, 9:30 AM IST. And there is a T20I series against South Africa planned around Dec'24 end. The schedule will include 3 ODIs and 5 T20s.
normalised: Of course, we can’t forget the bilateral series. Team India is expected to have a test series against Australia sometime around November-December two thousand and twenty four. Remember the Border-Gavaskar Trophy? Expect the first test to be starting around twenty second November, nine thirty A-M I-S-T. And there is a T two zero I series against South Africa planned around December two thousand and twenty four end. The schedule will include three O-D-Is and five T two zeros.

unnormalised: For the football fans among us, the ISL (Indian Super League) is another highlight. While the exact dates are still fuzzy, expect it to kick off around Oct 2024. Matches usually take place at 7:30 PM IST. Last year, the final was played on 18/03/2024.
normalised: For the football fans among us, the I-S-L (Indian Super League) is another highlight. While the exact dates are still fuzzy, expect it to kick off around October two thousand and twenty four. Matches usually take place at seven thirty P-M I-S-T. Last year, the final was played on eighteenth March two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: Badminton lovers will be glued to their screens for the BWF World Tour Finals scheduled for Dec 11-15, 2024, in China. PV Sindhu is always a treat to watch! Plus, there are numerous other tournaments like the All England Open and the India Open, where our shuttlers are bound to shine. Keep an eye on the sports channels for more updates on these events, because timings and venues are always changing last minute!
normalised: Badminton lovers will be glued to their screens for the B-W-F World Tour Finals scheduled for December eleventh to fifteenth, two thousand and twenty four, in China. P-V Sindhu is always a treat to watch! Plus, there are numerous other tournaments like the All England Open and the India Open, where our shuttlers are bound to shine. Keep an eye on the sports channels for more updates on these events, because timings and venues are always changing last minute!

unnormalised: Don't forget to factor in match timings, especially if you're planning a watch party with your friends! Be sure to set your alarms according to IST (Indian Standard Time).
normalised: Don't forget to factor in match timings, especially if you're planning a watch party with your friends! Be sure to set your alarms according to I-S-T (Indian Standard Time).

unnormalised: So, get your jerseys ready, stock up on snacks, and prep for some sleepless nights! This season promises non-stop action, unforgettable moments, and hopefully, lots of victories for our teams. Cheers to the games!
normalised: So, get your jerseys ready, stock up on snacks, and prep for some sleepless nights! This season promises non-stop action, unforgettable moments, and hopefully, lots of victories for our teams. Cheers to the games!
